INVALID_CODE: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
NO_CHARACTER: {{author}} The character on this card is no longer available on Sofi and cannot be interacted with
NO_GIF: {{author}} You cannot remove cosmetics from a `GIF` card
NOT_GLOWED: {{author}} That card has no `Glow` applied to it
UNG_CONFIRMATION:
Are you sure you want to remove this card's `Glow`?
This process will cost **100** `Silver`
EMBED_FOOTER: The removed `Glow` will not return to your `Inventory`
NO_OWNER: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
NOT_ENOUGH_SILVERS: {{author}} You don't have enough `Silver` for this process
